meanings.definition: Of or relating to the study and treatment of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmologic examination helped diagnose the eye problem.
meanings.sent2: The ophthalmologic clinic offers various services for eye care.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmologic research team found a way to improve vision in mice.
meanings.sent4: Her ophthalmologic expertise shone brightly in the field of eye health.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmologic textbook provided detailed information on eye diseases.

meanings.definition: A doctor who specializes in the medical and surgical care of the eyes.
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmologic performed a successful cataract surgery.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the ophthalmologic next week for an eye check-up.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmologic joked that they had 'seen it all' in their career.
meanings.sent4: She admired the ophthalmologic's precision during the eye operation.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmologic's dedication to eye health was truly commendable.
